name: aeronaut_cloud
description: Particle Photon connected React-Native iOS application
author: Drew Andr√©

scripts.build-android-dev: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.development ./gradlew clean assembleDev && cd ..
scripts.build-android-beta: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew clean assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-android-prod: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./gradlew clean assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.install-android-dev: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.development ./gradlew clean installDebug && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
scripts.install-android-beta: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew clean installDebug && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
scripts.install-android-prod: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./gradlew clean installDebug && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
scripts.install-android-dev-release: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.development ./gradlew clean installDev && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
scripts.install-android-beta-release: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.staging ./gradlew clean installRelease && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
scripts.install-android-prod-release: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./gradlew clean installRelease && cd .. && npm run adb-reverse
